titleInfo.title: A Note on "Renegotiation in Repeated Games" [Games Econ. Behav. 1 (1989) 327–360]

mods.abstract: In Farrell and Maskin (1989), the authors present sufficient conditions for weakly renegotiation-proof payoffs in their Theorem 1 (p. 332). We show that a step in the proof of this theorem is not correct by giving a counterexample. Nevertheless, the sufficient conditions remain true, and we offer a correction of the proof.
